verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Roho yangu Yesu
inakutamani,
njoo kwangu Yesu
unipe heri. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nakupenda
kwani wewe mwema,
uniimarishe siku zote.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Uje kwangu
Yesu nakungoja,
kwani wewe urafiki mkuu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Maumbo
ya mkate na divai,
umo ndani kweli nasadiki.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Na uzidi
Yesu kuwa nami,
unipe uzima wa milele.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Unilishe
Yesu Mwili wako,
uninyweshe Yesu damu yako.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Na uzidi
Yesu kuwa nami,
unipe uzima wa milele.
